content.p: The focus of this research group is the examination of contemporary issues in occupational health and well-being with a particular emphasis on cross-cultural research. Our aim is to unpack the relationship between work, well-being and performance by examining specific psychosocial issues that have the potential for causing psychological or physical harm. This includes: telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8034 email: rke.hub@nottingham.edu.my
